Name ModelDrivenEngineering

Synopsis Use case: Tools for Model-driven Engineering.
Description Elisabeth is a software architect at a large airplane manufacturer and her concern is reliability and dependability of airplane control software. She and her team have designed a UML model of the control software and have extended it with annotations that describe the reliability of individual components. She will use this annotated model in two ways:
  • to extract relevant information from it to synthesize input for a statistical tool that will compute overall system reliability from the reliability of individual components;
  • to generate executable code that takes the reliability issues into account.
